synopsis: Hagiwara Sakura has been voted center vocalist of Sweet Diva four years running, but when she and friend and rival idol Miyazawa Elena get sent on TV gig to learn some pro wrestling moves a heated conversations with a pro wrestler leads to a full-body confrontation. Sakura loses her first real fight, but vows to return to the ring again as a pro and defeat her new rival, Kazama Rio.

Sakura gets the okay to start her training at Berserk and her coach Ryo puts her through her paces. Four months later, following the Hell of a Hundred Throws test, she is deemed ready for her debut match, but finally getting in the pro ring makes her realize how serious the sport is.

While Sakura's inability to escape the Boston Crab causes her to rack up a record-breaking streak of losses, Sweet Diva is at the top of the charts. Feeling as though she can no longer meet her fans expectations in either realm, Sakura is about to quit Berserk and go back to being a normal girl when fellow wrestler Misaki shows up to give her some special training.
Thanks to some special training from Misaki, the beautiful and determined Sakura is ready for her next match! Will her hard work finally pay off?
Sakura continues to push her body to the breaking point under the watchful eye of Misaki – but what she really needs is a signature move worthy of an idol!
Sakura finally turns her idol training into a formidable signature move. Basking in the glow of her first victory, the brawling beauty vows to work even harder!

title.jp: The World Champion Comes to Japan!

synopsis: The return of world champ Jackall Tojo – and an unexpected injury to Misaki – lands Sakura a coveted spot in a very special wrestling match!

title.jp: The Power of the World Champ!

synopsis: Despite her growing strength, improved technique, and signature move, Sakura is defeated by a true champion. Undaunted, the idol-turned-wrestler is eager for another shot at the top!
A fighter with a background in karate officially joins the ranks, and Sakura is challenged by a mysterious masked wrestler!
Sakura must dig deep to overcome her opponent's karate skills, and the masked wrestler's shocking identity is finally revealed!
Sakura and her old friend Elena pummel each other provocatively in sweaty, sexy grudge match for the ages!
The spirited, and sadistic, match between Sakura and Elena reaches its epic, pulse-pounding climax!
